daily_description: We'll start with a beautiful coastal ride to Cap Salines to warm up the legs and enjoy the sea breeze.
A day exploring the scenic rolling hills and farmlands around the classic town of Llucmajor.
Today's ride takes us through the heart of Mallorca to the historic town of Petra, a favorite among local cyclists.
Experience one of the most beautiful and tranquil valleys on the island with the classic Orient loop.
The main event. We'll tackle the world-famous, serpentine climb of Sa Calobra.
A stunning ride out to the Formentor peninsula, culminating in breathtaking views from the lighthouse.
A final, relaxed ride along the beautiful east coast to Porto Cristo to spin out the legs before departure.
